data.title: Dead Mage Game Development Studio
data.meta_description: Dead Mage Inc. is an independent game development studio focused on developing high quality PC and console games.
data.text:
Children of Morta

Children of Morta is a roguelike hack and slash game where you experience the events and lives of the members of the last remaining family who live close to the now corrupted Mount Morta.This game has a novel way to integrate narrative and adventure into an action roguelike game where you will feel the joy and sorrow of the family members, slay the demonic creatures and follow their story helping each other to find a way to cure the corruption and reveal the secrets.

Genre: Action/Hack and Slash/Rogue-like

Platform: PC (Win/Mac/Linux)

Release Date (PC): Sep 3, 2019

Release Date (PS4, Xbox One, Switch): Oct 15, 2019

Website: http://childrenofmorta.com

Shadow Blade: Reload

Shadow Blade: Reload is an action platforming side scroller game for PC (Win/Mac/Linux). The game inlcudes a full story campaign where you will adventure in 7 chapters and follow a comic book style story and also a challenge mode where you can see how good of a ninja you are in the various challenge levels. A major feature for Shadow Blade: Reload is a full blown level editor where you can create your own levels and share them with your friends.

Genre: Action-Adventure Platformer

Platform: PC (Win/Mac/Linux)

Release Date: July 2014 (Steam Early Access)

store.steampowered.com/app/272330

AppStore: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/shadow-blade-reload/id1055138354?mt=8

Epic of Kings

Epic of Kings is the upcoming action adventure game for mobile devices. In Epic of Kings, players are invited to control their hero and lead him into battle against waves of lethal adversaries as he embarks on a simple mission only to find out soon that he is part of a larger adventure and challenge. The player will traverse the various epic landscapes of the mythological world of Khunirath.

Genre: Action-Adventure

Platform: Mobile (iOS/Android)

Release Date: Feb 2016

Website: http://epicofkingsgame.com

Shadow Blade

Shadow Blade is an action-platforming side-scroller game for iOS platforms. The game features fluid touch-based controls that puts you in control of the whole range of the capabilities of a ninja. You have your katana, your shurikens and kusarigama. But more importantly, you have your body that lets you scale walls, runs throw challenges undetected and jump over traps. The game will reward your skill, your speed and your stealth.

Genre: Action-Platformer

Platform: iOS, Android, OUYA, Mac

Release Date: Jan 2014

website: http://shadowblade.deadmage.com/

Garshasp: The Monster Slayer

Years after the confinement of Azhi Dahaka by Fereydun, the evil Deevs (Monsters) who were the commanders in the army of darkness led by Azhi Dahaka rose again in different parts of the ancient lands of Khunirath and rebelled against the humans who were celebrating the victory of the army of light.

This game is based on ancient Persian mythology bringing to life the epic battles of the mythological hero, Garshasp, in the ancient lands against the evil monsters. You play as Garshasp himself, the strongest man in Persian Mythology, in a journey to revenge and reclaim the legendary mace of his ancestors which is stolen by the Deevs. A journey which proves to unlock more significant hidden mysteries. The main mechanics of the game revolve around melee combat, platforming and exploration.

Genre: Action-Adventure

Platform: PC

Release Date: May 31st, 2011

Published: Retail (Just A Game Gmbh), Digital (Steam, Amazon, Gamersgate)

website: http://www.garshasp.com
